quotes.quote: Grandma's listen because they care and helpful advice always willing to share.
A grandma is warm hugs and sweet memories. She remembers all of your accomplishments and forgets all of your mistakes.
I look out the window sometimes to seek the color of the shadows and the different greens in the trees, but when I get ready to paint I just close my eyes and imagine a scene.
Grandmothers are wonderful ladies who always seem to place others in front of themselves.

A Grandmother is someone special in your life Someone who always has time, Time to listen, time to play Time to visit the zoo Time to linger and look at the things I want to do Time to laugh, time to sing,Time for me, her grandchild, just to be Time to read, time to walk Time to let me just play at the dock.
A Grandmother thinks of her grandchildren day and night, even when they are not with her.She will always love them more than anyone would understand.
Grandma always made you feel she had been waiting to see just you all day and now the day was complete.
Becoming a grandmother is wonderful. One moment you're just a mother. The next you are all-wise and prehistoric.
Few things are more delightful than grandchildren fighting over your lap.
There aren't too many things that are more comforting on this earth than a hug from grandma.
Perfect love sometimes does not come until the first grandchild.
Grandmothers always have time to talk and make you feel special.
We should all have one person who knows how to bless us despite the evidence, Grandmother was that person to me.
It is as grandmothers that our mothers come into the fullness of their grace.
When grandparents enter the door, discipline flies out the window.
Grandmothers are voices of the past and role models of the present. Grandmothers open the doors to the future.
A grandmother is one of those rare individuals who you may always depend on.
Grandmotherâ€ doesn't mean that you have gray hair and you retire and stay home cooking cakes for your grandchildren.
Truth be told, being a grandma is as close as we ever get to perfection. The ultimate warm sticky bun with plump raisins and nuts. Clouds nine, ten, and eleven.
Nobody can do for little children what grandparents do. Grandparents sort of sprinkle stardust over the lives of little children.

Since the beginning of time, grandmothers have been the negotiators and peacemakers in their families. Grandmothers are voices of the past and role models of the present. Grandmothers open the doors to the future.
A grandmother pretends she doesn't know who you are on Halloween.
You are the sun, Grandma, you are the sun in my life.

My grandmother always used to say, "If you know your past and you know where you have to go, why do you rehearse?" I always remember this and it's true. You have to start each day again - you can't repeat what you did.

Having a grandmother is like having an army. This is a grandchild's ultimate privilege: knowing that someone is on your side, always, whatever the details. Even when you are wrong. Especially then, in fact. A grandmother is both a sword and a shield.
If becoming a grandmother was only a matter of choice, I should advise every one of you straight away to become one. There is no fun for old people like it!
Uncles and aunts, and cousins, are all very well, and fathers and mothers are not to be despised; but a grandmother, at holiday time, is worth them all.
The thoughts of becoming a grandmother is one which one cannot hold the excitement. It is a great experience. One that replaces no other!
A grandmother is a little bit parent, a little bit teacher, and a little bit best friend.
A mother becomes a true grandmother the day she stops noticing the terrible things her children do because she is so enchanted with the wonderful things her grandchildren do.
Grandmothers hold their grandchildren in a special place in their heart.
What a wonderful contribution our grandmothers and grandfathers can make if they will share some of the rich experiences and their testimonies with their children and grandchildren.
A grandmother always has time for you, even if the rest of the world is busy.
If I had known how wonderful it would be to have grandchildren, I'd have had them first.
You do not really understand something unless you can explain it to your grandmother.
What children need most are the essentials that grandparents provide in abundance. They give unconditional love, kindness, patience, humor, comfort, lessons in life. And, most importantly, cookies.
Everyone needs to have access both to grandparents and grandchildren in order to be a full human being.
A grandparent is old on the outside but young on the inside.
If your baby is beautiful and perfect, never cries or fusses, sleeps on schedule and burps on demand, an angel all the time, you're the grandma.
A grandma's name is little less in love than is the doting title of a mother.
The simplest toy, one which even the youngest child can operate, is called a grandparent.
A conservative is someone who makes no changes and consults his grandmother when in doubt.
What a bargain grandchildren are! I give them my loose change, and they give me a million dollars' worth of pleasure.
A home without a grandmother is like an egg without salt.
When the grandmothers of today hear the word Chippendales, they don't necessarily think of chairs.
If you would civilize a man, begin with his grandmother.
When a child is born, so are grandmothers.
Her grandmother, as she gets older, is not fading but rather becoming more concentrated.
Grandparents are there to help the child get into mischief they haven't thought of yet.
This is a place where grandmothers hold babies on their laps under the stars and whisper in their ears that the lights in the sky are holes in the floor of heaven.
As I learned from growing up, you don't mess with your grandmother.
To become a grandparent is to enjoy one of the few pleasures in life for which the consequences have already been paid.
Through a grandmother's voice and hands the end of life is known at the beginning.
Grandmother-grandchild relationships are simple. Grandmas are short on criticism and long on love.
There are grandmothers out there who would move heaven and earth for their grandchildren.
When it seems the world can’t understand, your grandmother’s there to hold your hand.
A garden of love grows in a grandmother's heart.
Grandparents, like heroes, are as necessary to a child’s growth as vitamins.
Grandmother opens up a new world of change, challenge, and celebration in a woman’s life.
Sometimes our grandmas and grandpas are like grand angels.
Grandmas hold our tiny hands for just a little while, but our hearts forever.
Every house needs a grandmother in it.
It’s such a grand thing to be a mother of a mother. That’s why the world calls her grandmother.
Grandmas are moms with lots of frosting.
Grandmother a wonderful mother with lots of practice.
A grandmother is a babysitter who watches the kids instead of the television.
There’s no place like home except Grandma’s.
It’s impossible for a grandmother to understand that few people, and maybe none, will find her grandchild as endearing as she does.
A grandma’s heart is a patchwork of love.
